Entries.Entry: Ah ha! It looks like <string0> is pregnant.<wait>
Huh? Nothing happened.<wait>
I don't have a Breeding Bin available.<wait>
My Barn is too full. I can't take in any more animals.<wait>
<playername>, hello. Do you have a moment? I have a favor to ask...<wait>

You see, this little foal of mine here isn't feeling too well. It needs a little extra care.<wait><page> Unfortunately, I don't have the time to give it that care. I was hoping you might raise it for me.<wait>
Ah, but I would truly appreciate your help with this...<wait>
Or...can you not do it?
Accept
Decline
I see. Well, if you can't, then you can't. I won't bother you with this again. Good day.<wait>
You will? Good, good! I knew I could count on you.<wait><page> Well then, why not give this little one a name?<wait>

There isn't much to worry yourself over when it comes to raising horses.<wait><page> Just give â€˜em lots of love and care, and that'll be plenty.<wait><page> Talk to them every day, yeah? They do love hearing your voice.<wait><page> Brushing them every day is good for them too.<wait>
All right, then. I'll take this little one on over to your Stable.<wait>
Once it's grown, I'll come back for it.<wait><page> Take good care of it for me until then. I'm counting on you.<wait>
<playername>, hello. I've come to check in on little <string0>.<wait><page> I'm thinking it should be about grown by now.<wait>
Hrm... Mm-hmm... Mm-hmm...<wait>
Good, good! I can tell you spent the last 90 days raising <string0> with lots of love and care. You've done a fine job. You pass.<wait>

As thanks for your hard work, I don't mind letting you keep <string0> as your own.<wait><page> They seem like they're quite fond of you, after all.<wait><page> Well then, keep taking excellent care of little... Well, big <string0> now. I know I can count on you.<wait>
Hrm... Mm-hmm... Mm-hmm...<wait>
No, no, no. This won't do at all, <playername>.<wait><page> It's been an entire year, but you haven't shown <string0> enough love. I'm afraid I have to fail you.<wait>
I'll be taking <string0> back home with me, then. Good day.<wait>
<playername>, hello. I can't help but notice you don't have a single horse on your farm.<wait>
This here is one that I raised. I'll let you have it. It'll make things seem a bit more farm-y.<wait><page> You can give it a name too, if you'd like.<wait>
Now then, I'll go take this little one to your barn.<wait><page> Show it lots of love every day, y'hear? Don't forget to talk to it and give it a good brushing.<wait>
I'll leave <myhorsename> in your care, then. Good day.<wait>

There's a good little one. Hurry and grow up strong, okay?<wait>

Hello there, Hana. You sure are a cheerful pup, huh?<wait>
